forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming foggy and damp after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming foggy and damp after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 16C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
